meta.title: Collaborate with Product Beers
meta.description: Support Valencia's product community as a sponsor or by hosting our events at your space.

hero.label: Collaborate with us
hero.description: Join the companies and spaces that make Product Beers possible. Together we're building Valencia's most active product ecosystem.

sponsor.title: Become a Sponsor
sponsor.description: Support our events financially and gain visibility with Valencia's most active product community.

visibility.title: Brand visibility
visibility.description: Your logo on our website, social media, and during all events.

community.title: Community access
community.description: Connect with +200 product, design, and tech professionals.

networking.title: Exclusive networking
networking.description: Present your company and meet talent in a relaxed atmosphere.

content.title: Custom content
content.description: Option to sponsor talks or workshops in your area of expertise.

hoster.title: Host an Event
hoster.description: Have an office, coworking, or venue? Let us host an event there and we'll thank you publicly.

talent.title: Attract talent
talent.description: Product professionals will get to know your space and company.

brand.title: Position your brand
brand.description: Associate your company with Valencia's product community.

social.title: Social media mention
social.description: We mention you in all event communications.

community.title: Part of the community
community.description: Your team can participate in the event as attendees.

cta.title: Interested in collaborating?
cta.description: Fill out the form and we'll get in touch to explore collaboration options.
